remarks: A true wff can always be added as a nested antecedent to an antecedent. Note: this theorem is intuitionistically valid (see ~ wl-embantALT ). (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 4-Oct-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-embant.1 $e |- ph $.
wl-embant.2 $e |- ( ps -> ch ) $.
wl-embant $p |- ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ch ) $.
